Package io.micronaut.guides.core

Class GuidesConfigurationProperties

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.guides.core.GuidesConfigurationProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
GuidesConfiguration
@ConfigurationProperties("guides") public class GuidesConfigurationProperties extends Object implements GuidesConfiguration
GuidesConfigurationProperties is a class that implements the GuidesConfiguration interface. It is annotated with @ConfigurationProperties to bind the properties with the specified prefix.
